description: se procurer les articles suivants. La livraison est demandee a BFC Halifax, Nouvelle-Ecosse et BFC Esquimalt, Colombie-Britannique.
full_summary:
### FILTER ELEMENTS
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-241597/A
#### Amendment Number: 1
#### Publication Date: June 2, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: June 20, 2023 - 14:00:00

The Department of National Defence, as the contracting entity, invites bids for the supply of filter elements. The solicitation is subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and requires a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

**Scope of Work**

The supply involves four (4) items, including:

* Item 1: Filter Element, Fluid, NSN 01-5894378
* Item 2: Filter Element, Fluid, NSN 01-5894378
* Item 3: Filter, Fluid, NSN 12-3485061
* Item 4: Filter, Fluid, NSN 12-3485061

Each item is to be delivered to one of two locations: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia or CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Submission Requirements**

* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders may submit equivalent or substitute products, providing brand name and model, and/or part number and National Stock Number (NSN).
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Evaluation Criteria**

The selection criteria is based on the Lowest Price methodology.

**Contact Information**

For further information, please contact:

Neil Trousdale
neil.trousdale@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-9209

**Attachments**

* RFP Document (English): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6025/w8482-241597---rfp-eng.pdf
* RFP Document (French): https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6025/w8482-241597---rfp-fr.pdf

An expired tender notification means that the bidding period closes on the specified date (June 20, 2023) but the contractor initially supplied may still be processed for a procurement contract taking into account the delivery date range specified in the respective RFP (Request For Proposal) document, in this case: *unspecified*. Please consult the bidding guidelines and procedures relevant to your bidding jurisdiction for more information regarding this matter.

### End of Notice.

Please modify with respect to this reception of service and the papers you  will be providing at
